arts.sum: Just three days after Flamengo lifted the Copa do Brasil after a 4-1 aggregate win over Atletico Mineiro in the Copa do Brasil, the pair battle it out again. Flamengo come into this duel sitting thir...

arts.ttl: Preview: Flamengo vs. Atletico Mineiro - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Wednesday's Brasileiro clash between Flamengo and Atletico Mineiro, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
